achievement_pursuit.description: Seeks mastery, progress, challenge, and personal excellence.
achievement_pursuit.activation: Triggered by opportunities to improve, compete, or excel.
behaviors: intense focus on growth or skill acquisition

connection_seeking.description: Finds reward in closeness, belonging, emotional warmth, and shared experiences.
connection_seeking.activation: Triggered by intimacy cues, validation, and relational stability.

novelty_exploration.description: Pursues stimulation, new experiences, adventure, or discovery.
novelty_exploration.activation: Triggered by freedom, change, curiosity, or reduced constraint.

comfort_preservation.description: Seeks ease, predictability, familiarity, and low-stress environments.
comfort_preservation.activation: Triggered by overstimulation, burnout, or uncertainty.
behaviors: resisting change unless safety is guaranteed
